title: How to Make Shrimp Pasta Salad

steps.headline: Cook the pasta as the package instructs.
Whisk cocktail sauce, lemon juice, mayonnaise, ranch dressing, Worcestershire sauce, and salt and pepper together in a large bowl.
Stir in now-cooled pasta, shrimp, tomato, green onion, sweet red pepper, and parsley.
Refrigerate for 1-2 hours.
steps.description: You can also serve warm, if you prefer.

text: Cook the pasta as the package instructs.  Drain pasta.  Rinse pasta with cold water. This will cool it quickly. Drain pasta.  Whisk cocktail sauce, lemon juice, mayonnaise, ranch dressing, Worcestershire sauce, and salt and pepper together in a large bowl.  Stir in now-cooled pasta, shrimp, tomato, green onion, sweet red pepper, and parsley.  Refrigerate for 1-2 hours. You can also serve warm, if you prefer.
